title: Print, "Great Fair Given at the City Assembly Rooms, New York, December 1861, in Aid of City Poor, from Harper's Weekly, December 28, 1861, pp. 824-825.", December 28, 1861
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
signed: Signed on block, lower left: W. HOMER.
description: Horizontal view of the interior of a large hall with booths displaying merchandise set up all around it (a numbered booth in lower right foreground) and groups of men and women moving about it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Great Fair Given at the City Assembly Rooms, New York, December 1861, in Aid of City Poor, from Harper's Weekly, December 28, 1861, pp. 824-825.", December 28, 1861.
December 28, 1861. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-8.
